nodes.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
nodes.title: appfleet - Edge compute for containerized services & deploy global apps
nodes.author: Dmitriy A.

localize.description: appfleet是一个边缘计算平台，允许人们在全球范围内部署他们的网络应用。您现在可以在任何地方同时运行您的代码，而不是在单一的集中位置运行。获得更好的性能、延迟和正常运行时间!
localize.tagline: 用于容器化服务和部署全局应用的边缘计算。

localize.description: appfleet是一個邊緣計算平臺，允許人們在全球範圍內部署他們的網絡應用。您現在可以在任何地方同時運行您的代碼，而不是在單一的集中位置運行。獲得更好的性能、延遲和正常運行時間!
localize.tagline: 用於容器化服務和部署全局應用的邊緣計算。

nodes.excerpt: Supersourcing helps both startups & enterprises find the right tech partners faster than ever before. The decade-old process of outsourcing is boring, expensive and often risky. Supersourcing is 100% pure delight. Trusted by founders from YC, Harvard & MIT.
nodes.title: Supersourcing - Discover & hire the right tech partner for your business
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 超级外包帮助初创公司和企业比以往任何时候都更快地找到合适的技术合作伙伴。十年前的外包过程是枯燥的、昂贵的，而且往往是有风险的。而Supersourcing则是100%的纯粹乐趣。受到来自YC、哈佛和MIT的创始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 为您的企业发现和雇佣合适的技术合作伙伴。

localize.description: 超級外包幫助初創公司和企業比以往任何時候都更快地找到合適的技術合作夥伴。十年前的外包過程是枯燥的、昂貴的，而且往往是有風險的。而Supersourcing則是100%的純粹樂趣。受到來自YC、哈佛和MIT的創始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 爲您的企業發現和僱傭合適的技術合作夥伴。

nodes.excerpt: Share your remote story! We are excited to introduce RemoteRated, a focused place to rate and review the remote competence, benefits, and tools of companies. Like Glassdoor, for our new remote world.
nodes.title: RemoteRated - Glassdoor for a remote world
nodes.author: Maxim Wheatley

localize.description: 分享您的远程故事 我们很高兴地介绍RemoteRated，这是一个专注于评价和审查公司远程能力、福利和工具的地方。像Glassdoor一样，为我们的新远程世界服务。
localize.tagline: 遥远世界的Glassdoor

localize.description: 分享您的遠程故事 我們很高興地介紹RemoteRated，這是一個專注於評價和審查公司遠程能力、福利和工具的地方。像Glassdoor一樣，爲我們的新遠程世界服務。
localize.tagline: 遙遠世界的Glassdoor

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

localize.description: Tally是一种新型的表单构建器。只需开始输入并在几秒钟内建立各种用途的表单。不需要知道如何编写代码，而且是免费的。
localize.tagline: 免费创建表格的最简单方法

localize.description: Tally是一種新型的表單構建器。只需開始輸入並在幾秒鐘內建立各種用途的表單。不需要知道如何編寫代碼，而且是免費的。
localize.tagline: 免費創建表格的最簡單方法

nodes.excerpt: Our browser-based plug-in lets you build Excel import automation processes in less than 10 minutes. No code required. And the tool works in any online business system.
nodes.title: Cognifirm - Automated Excel import into any online business system
nodes.author: Per Damgaard

localize.description: 我们的基于浏览器的插件可以让您在10分钟内建立Excel导入自动化流程。不需要任何代码。而且该工具可在任何在线业务系统中使用。

nodes.excerpt: Hand Music is an easy to use music app which can be controlled by moving your palm to any block. Simply position your hand above a block to hear it play.

localize.description: 手游音乐是一款简单易用的音乐应用，可以通过将手掌移动到任何积木来控制。只需将你的手放在块上面就可以听到它的播放。
localize.tagline: 用你的手势做音乐

localize.description: 手遊音樂是一款簡單易用的音樂應用，可以通過將手掌移動到任何積木來控制。只需將你的手放在塊上面就可以聽到它的播放。
localize.tagline: 用你的手勢做音樂

nodes.excerpt: Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR and bring a little laughter back to everyone's homes. The brand new quarantine pastime. Currently in Beta!
nodes.title: Karaoke Nite - Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR
nodes.author: Sonny Li

localize.description: 在网络上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把欢声笑语带回大家的家中。全新的检疫消遣方式。目前正在测试中!
localize.tagline: 在网络上或VR中与朋友一起K歌。

localize.description: 在網絡上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把歡聲笑語帶回大家的家中。全新的檢疫消遣方式。目前正在測試中!
localize.tagline: 在網絡上或VR中與朋友一起K歌。

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
nodes.author: Anika Mehrotra

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來

nodes.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
nodes.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center

localize.description: Kbee为你，你的团队，或你的客户将Google Drive文件夹转化为一个可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 将Google Drive变成wiki或帮助中心。

localize.tagline: 將Google Drive變成wiki或幫助中心。

nodes.excerpt: Focus on what matters, from small tasks to life goals: - Spend your time doing things and reaching your goals - Stop wasting your time classifying things or measuring productivity. Minimalist and delightful design. No sign up. No ads. No data collected.
nodes.title: Listed - The minimalist app for your to-dos & notes
nodes.author: François Goldgewicht

localize.description: 专注于重要的事情，从小任务到人生目标。- 把时间花在做事情和实现目标上 不要再浪费时间去分类或衡量生产力了 简约而愉悦的设计。无需注册。没有广告。不收集数据。
localize.tagline: 为你的待办事项和笔记而设计的极简主义应用。

localize.description: 專注於重要的事情，從小任務到人生目標。- 把時間花在做事情和實現目標上 不要再浪費時間去分類或衡量生產力了 簡約而愉悅的設計。無需註冊。沒有廣告。不收集數據。
localize.tagline: 爲你的待辦事項和筆記而設計的極簡主義應用。

nodes.excerpt: A comprehensive tool for ensuring that Applicant Tracking Systems (ATSs) and other automatic filtering systems can accurately read you CV and extract text from it. Your CV will only progress to a human reviewer if a machine can read it properly.
nodes.title: e-Read My CV - Test if machine can parse your CV and read its content
nodes.author: Vlad  Grossman

localize.description: 一个全面的工具，确保申请人跟踪系统(ATS)和其他自动过滤系统能够准确地阅读你的简历并从中提取文本。只有当机器能够正确阅读您的简历时，您的简历才会提交给人工审核员。
localize.tagline: 测试机器是否能解析你的简历并读取其内容。

localize.description: 一個全面的工具，確保申請人跟蹤系統(ATS)和其他自動過濾系統能夠準確地閱讀你的簡歷並從中提取文本。只有當機器能夠正確閱讀您的簡歷時，您的簡歷纔會提交給人工審覈員。
localize.tagline: 測試機器是否能解析你的簡歷並讀取其內容。

nodes.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.

nodes.author: Jake Luciani

localize.description: 按需扩展数据库资源，以满足应用需求和流量，因此您只需为您使用的资源付费。在每个云上运行，并提供开发者GraphQL、REST、JSON、CQL API。每月25美元的使用额度。
localize.tagline: 按需数据库，为您的下一个项目增压

localize.description: 按需擴展數據庫資源，以滿足應用需求和流量，因此您只需爲您使用的資源付費。在每個雲上運行，並提供開發者GraphQL、REST、JSON、CQL API。每月25美元的使用額度。
localize.tagline: 按需數據庫，爲您的下一個項目增壓

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.
nodes.title: Litmaps - Search scientific literature with interactive citations map
nodes.author: Axton Pitt

localize.description: Litmaps让你通过交互式可视化的引用网络来浏览科学文献。创建一个文献地图，发现新的文章，并导出你的发现，以推进你的研究项目。
localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地图搜索科学文献

localize.description: Litmaps讓你通過交互式可視化的引用網絡來瀏覽科學文獻。創建一個文獻地圖，發現新的文章，並導出你的發現，以推進你的研究項目。
localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地圖搜索科學文獻

nodes.excerpt: The fastest way to create screenshots of your app for product pages on Apple App Store, Google Play Store, Microsoft Store, etc.

nodes.excerpt: Drink Map is a small app that helps you log the places in which you have drunk. By pressing the only real button available, "Raise the jug", you'll mark your location. Learn a new fact every time you use the app on the DID YOU KNOW? section!
nodes.title: Drink Map - Mark places where you have drunk
nodes.author: Unai Sanchez

localize.description: 饮酒地图是一款能帮你记录喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一个真实的按钮 "举杯"，你就会标记你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW栏目中，每次使用该应用都能了解到一个新的事实!
localize.tagline: 记下你喝过酒的地方

localize.description: 飲酒地圖是一款能幫你記錄喝酒的地方的小程序。按下唯一一個真實的按鈕 "舉杯"，你就會標記你的位置。在DID YOU KNOW欄目中，每次使用該應用都能瞭解到一個新的事實!
localize.tagline: 記下你喝過酒的地方

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Keka希望成为一个易于使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，并且非常强大。而它也确实如此。你可以压缩所有常见（和不常见）格式的文件，并解压几乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
localize.tagline: macOS文件归档器

localize.description: Keka希望成爲一個易於使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，並且非常強大。而它也確實如此。你可以壓縮所有常見（和不常見）格式的文件，並解壓幾乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
localize.tagline: macOS文件歸檔器

nodes.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
nodes.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.
nodes.author: George Prendergast

localize.description: HelloScribe Guru可以在几秒钟内写出关于任何主题的草稿。自动写作的长篇内容从来没有更快，更容易，或更方便。脱离空白页--告别作家的块垒
localize.tagline: 你的AI-powered article writer--是真的。

localize.description: HelloScribe Guru可以在幾秒鐘內寫出關於任何主題的草稿。自動寫作的長篇內容從來沒有更快，更容易，或更方便。脫離空白頁--告別作家的塊壘
localize.tagline: 你的AI-powered article writer--是真的。

nodes.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
nodes.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

localize.description: Beam让您轻松获得报酬，向您的忠实粉丝发送短信。直接向您的月度付费用户发送高级付费内容、图片或视频。
localize.tagline: 通过文字获得报酬，让您的追随者高兴

localize.description: Beam讓您輕鬆獲得報酬，向您的忠實粉絲髮送短信。直接向您的月度付費用戶發送高級付費內容、圖片或視頻。
localize.tagline: 通過文字獲得報酬，讓您的追隨者高興

nodes.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
nodes.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗

nodes.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
nodes.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.
nodes.author: Andy Bromberg

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。

nodes.excerpt: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime access🎉
nodes.title: Zupermaker - 1000+ tools & resources to grow and supercharge your skills

localize.tagline: 1000+工具和资源，让你的技能得到成长和提升。

localize.tagline: 1000+工具和資源，讓你的技能得到成長和提升。

nodes.excerpt: Poser is a vector illustration pack that includes 20 unique illustrated poses that can be used to emphasize key features of your products and/or services. We have a 25% discount for Product Hunt buyers https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph
nodes.title: Poser illustrations - Customizable illustrations for your projects
nodes.author: Greg Dlubacz

localize.description: Poser是一个矢量插画包，包括20个独特的插画姿势，可以用来强调你的产品和/或服务的关键特征。我们为Product Hunt买家提供25%的折扣，https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph。
localize.tagline: 为您的项目提供可定制的插图

localize.description: Poser是一個矢量插畫包，包括20個獨特的插畫姿勢，可以用來強調你的產品和/或服務的關鍵特徵。我們爲Product Hunt買家提供25%的折扣，https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph。
localize.tagline: 爲您的項目提供可定製的插圖
